title: People who use the challenged evidence as evidence to support their claim
body:
Seriously....

The only person I have encountered to actually use anything close to logic as apart of their claim is a riot admin. Good on them, to the rest of you please learn what logic actually is, then attempt to apply it.

replies.body: What topic are you referring to?

People telling me that solo queue is not heavily based on luck and their evidence is that I am low elo, my argument is that I am low elo primarily due to bad luck which is the biggest factor in each game. They tell me I am wrong about this BECAUSE I am in low elo.

I would just like to see the communities opinion on this.

i could give you an explanation, but based on what i've seen i highly doubt you would even consider it.

i think your mind is made up already and very little will change that.
Based on your comments, yes it is. But if you like I'll explain
Low elo isn't just luck. Have you seen unranked to diamond ? Gosu did it, Nightblue is currently doing one. It isn't pure luck, it is skill as well
You need luck before your skill becomes relevant, not much luck but its still the deciding factor of whether it is actually possible for you to carry or not.

> [{quoted}](name=xuzhinhen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NPqcyTcp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-26T16:23:05.531+0000)
>
> People telling me that solo queue is not heavily based on luck and their evidence is that I am low elo, my argument is that I am low elo primarily due to bad luck which is the biggest factor in each game. They tell me I am wrong about this BECAUSE I am in low elo.
> 
> I would just like to see the communities opinion on this.

luck isn't real.

Luck is simply a factor in which we do not have control over and do not have the details for in order to make a decision with, If you knew who the enemy team was going to be and who you were going to get paired up with before the game would you happily except worse players on your teams?
This is about an illogical concept that is being used against on me in particular conversations which is really painful to deal with and people do not understand they are doing it.
he talked so slowly took him like 40 minutes to finish his 1st point, whatever that was, about using common sense or some shit.....
